dict.string: Nudge reads your health data like steps, sleep, and workouts to provide personalized wellness insights and track your progress over time.
Nudge saves your mood check-ins and wellness metrics to Apple Health so you can see a complete picture of your wellbeing in one place.
Nudge uses the microphone for voice check-ins so you can quickly capture your thoughts and mood by speaking.
Nudge uses the camera to capture photos for your check-ins and wellness journal.
Nudge accesses your photo library to attach images to your check-ins and wellness journal.
